short_summary: PSIB is seeking proposals from compannies interested in Janitorial Service to provide services to the Department of National Development
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on 2023-03-13 by 14:00 EDT. All bids submitted after 14:00 EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. Canada is seeking offers from Offerors to provide Janitorial Service for office trailers at the former Camp Ipperwash in Stony Point First Nation, Ontario to the Department of National Defence.
